Comments_List: Gained a thorough understanding of the forces that occur on the nanoscale but affect things we see everyday and in our research projects.
Very discussion based, problem sets were informative. Wording on problem sets and tests was a little confusing at times. Many times class answered questions in ways teacher/TA had not anticipated.
Yes. Course is very informative but also very accessible for students from a variety of backgrounds.
